az900_q1.text: A startup wants to deploy applications quickly without managing physical servers and scale based on demand. What best defines cloud computing in this scenario?

options.C: Delivering computing services over the internet on demand

az900_q2.text: According to the shared responsibility model, which task is always the responsibility of the cloud customer?

az900_q3.text: Which cloud deployment model combines on-premises infrastructure with public cloud services?

az900_q4.text: An organization requires full control over infrastructure due to strict compliance regulations. Which cloud model is most appropriate?

az900_q5.text: Which pricing model allows customers to pay only for the resources they consume?

az900_q6.text: Which benefit of cloud computing ensures applications remain available during failures?

az900_q7.text: What cloud benefit allows organizations to forecast performance and costs using SLAs and pricing tools?

az900_q8.text: Which cloud benefit enables centralized monitoring and automated resource management?

az900_q9.text: Which cloud service type provides the greatest level of control over the operating system?

az900_q10.text: Which cloud service type allows developers to focus on application code without managing infrastructure?

az900_q11.text: Which cloud service type delivers fully managed applications to end users?

az900_q12.text: A company runs workloads only during business hours. Which cloud pricing benefit helps reduce costs?

az900_q13.text: Which scenario best represents a serverless computing model?

options.B: Deploying code triggered by events without provisioning servers
options.D: Using a fully managed email service

az900_q14.text: Which benefit of cloud computing helps enforce policies and compliance standards?

az900_q15.text: Which scenario is best suited for IaaS?

options.A: Using CRM software via a browser
options.B: Deploying a web app without managing servers
options.C: Migrating a legacy application requiring OS control
Deploying an application without managing the OS

az900_q18.text: Which cloud benefit reduces the risk of over-provisioning resources?

az900_q19.text: Which expense model is primarily associated with cloud computing?

az900_q20.text: Which statement best summarizes cloud computing?

options.A: A replacement for all on-premises systems
options.C: A model for delivering IT resources on demand with shared responsibility
